name: jules-agents
title: Jules Agents
description: Create and manage async sessions with Google Jules Agents
author: ihildy

commands.name: launch-session
commands.title: Launch Session
commands.description: Start a new session with Jules Agents.

commands.name: list-sessions
commands.title: List Sessions
commands.description: Check all your sessions from anywhere.

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar Overview
commands.description: Check all your sessions from your menu bar.

preferences.name: requirePlanApproval
preferences.title: Launch Options
preferences.label: Require plan approval
preferences.description: Whether Jules should require plan approval by default

preferences.name: autoCreatePR
preferences.label: Automatically create a PR
preferences.description: Whether Jules should automatically create a PR by default

preferences.name: defaultActivityFilter
preferences.title: Default Activity Filter
preferences.description: The default filter to apply to the activity list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
